price: ដោយភ្នែករបស់ពួកគេទម្លាក់ចុះ ខណៈដែលពួកគេចេញពី ផ្នូរ ពួកគេហាក់ដូចជាសត្វកណ្ដូបដែលនៅរាយពាសពេញលើផ្ទៃដី។
arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: khushaʿan abṣāruhum yakhrujūna mina al-ajdāthi ka-annahum jarādun muntashirun
